name: Hans Dieter Rombach
content: Software Engineering: Process Measurement Research Group: Dieter Rombach Software Engineering: Processes and Measurement Research Group Home Lecture Research Staff Publications Job Offers Networks Partners About us Datenschutzerklärung Impressum Staff Dieter Rombach Dieter Rombach Position Head of the Research Group for Software Engineering (AGSE) Research Topics Establishment of the research area Experimental Software Engineering. Development of techniques/methods/tools for modeling software engineering know-how, measuring and evaluating software products and processes as well as reuse. Development of techniques/methods/tools for systematic (i.e. planable and controllable) software development. Improvement of the transfer of new techniques/methods/tools into the industrial practice Principal Investigator in our Proposal "Industrial Mathematics for Computational Engineering" (IMCOME) for a Cluster of Excellence. Address Prof. Dr. Dr. h.c. H. Dieter Rombach Technische Universität Kaiserslautern Gebäude 32 Postfach 3049 67653 Kaiserslautern GERMANY Telephone / Email Telephone: +49 (631) 205-2895 Secretary: +49 (631) 205-3341 Fax: +49 (631) 205-3331 Email: Prof. Dr. Dr. h.c.
